author: {'steamid': '76561198120541626', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 930, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1620530992}
review: Alright this is my first time being legit about writing reviews, but here goes nothing. It might be a little some skips and there, but I'm doing that because to get you more interest about the real plot and the suspense that it has.( Yes I mean real plot not the "plot" we know about anime and etc.) First things first, what I really love about VN's is the music. I think having that specific atomsphere really makes you be in that mood or even really feel it. The music in this one is absolute fantastic. I'm already in love with this one song, but I don't know the name of it.(Plus the 18+ scenes, but it doesn't have it! NOOOOOOOOO WHY! that's like one of the best parts.. Because it literally, makes it better.). Well maybe that's just me... Already playing through the prolouge the suspense is killing me! Its one of those moments where I don't want to stop and I wanna know more! kinda like a book,manga, tv, and etc.. whatever interests in you to keep going. At that moment, when the prolouge ends, then the opeing trailer shows I guess you can say what they do for VN's comes up and I'm just like okay I'm gonna keep playing. Overall, I just want to let ya know if that is it that kind of VN that makes you feel to keep going and finish it to know how it ends.( Its kinda a long review, but I try for the first time to be serious about a VN I enjoy(feelsbadman no 18+) and give a review people might enjoy to read.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073421958', 'num_games_owned': 553, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1466675258}
review:
This is a rather interesting take on the 47 ronin story with almost all the ronin replaced by female and there is a guy who came from the future, in a way resembles Oda Nobuna and Koihime Musou. For a demo it features one full route (Kuranosuke) which is pretty amazing.
The art is pretty good although for the loli the disporportianate head looks rather weird.

A worthwhile read and a rather educational one especially if you're interested in the 47 ronin story and I do hope they release the rest to the west.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166725053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 728, 'last_played': 1695499506}
review:
Great game, I tried to back this up on kick starter two times but guess backers are not satisfied with the non full game release which is sad this is a great PLOT game yes real PLOT not he PLOT people are thinking about.

Cons- not the full game but you get one full route which is a lot for a demo or try out for the visual novel

I would buy the full game when it is out. Hopefully they will bring the full game over to the west.

---------- Edit 2 ----------

As I have heard the Game is not going to add H scenes as extra patch because it's not licenced by this certain game but who knows what might happen.

Great intertaining story at least for me, I can not represent everyone but I do enjoy it.

It has great character developments, WARN slow start in a way but it quickly picks up later and you get the feeling as if you were in the main characters shoes.

If you are looking for a VN that gives you the FEELS this might be the game for you.

review:
It looks good, surprisingly good. And it's free! So... that's something.
But that's all the positive I can say about it.
All the girls feel kinda same-y and the story is yawn inducing and quite forgettable.

5/10, it thinks it's more interesting than it actually is.
If you're looking for a good story, it's not here.
If you're looking for cute anime girls, you'll be mashing your left click like there's no tomorrow.

author: {'steamid': '76561198266559803', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1466586550}
review:
First Impression was, "Oh, a free VN, probably not that good because usually free things are a waste of time, but hey I got time to spare, and i haven't played a VN in a while."

I've been proven wrong.

This VN although free, is surprisingly good. 
The story feels great, historical samurai stuff, kinda like the anime Oda Nobuna no Yabou.
The art is a little unproportional, (eye sizes, head to body proportions etc.) but it maybe be one its charms.

This game is censored, but it's free. Worth playing if you like visual novels.
If this game released a dlc or something that turns this game to the uncensored one, I would legitly buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276383313', 'num_games_owned': 2410, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1470584477}
review:
tits,moar tits and it's free...go try this game out
This game is longer than i expected but it sent an aww feeling till the end.
so far i enjoy the story,but without the choice of interacting with other character feels dead to me.
you play as suguha which the protagonist try to change the fate of 47 ronin but fail in the end in this free version. and you get back to the first day when you arrive in AKO province and that is where i fell the story is not complete if you did not buy the DLC ver. but hey for a free game with 14+ hour reading time is quite inspiring. HOWEVER,if this game can give me a choice to interact with other girls would be great.
another thing i dislike in this VN is no archievement and Trading Card which put me off from buying the DLC. i mean sure the story is great  however the lack of choice in interacting with other girls really hold me off from purchasing the game . If there is a trading Card or archievement maybe i will purchase it but hey i recomend it to people to try it first. Even if there is no H scene,im fine with that cause i do some research already,the art is not that great to me to have H/eroge in it. the story is what matter. in the end it really do tale a part of history of japan regarding the fate of 47 ronin. even IF you Cut the White Serpent BS.
